page.title: 19BUS SERVICES AND CARS
page.content: {BUS SERVICES} "Silver Service" of Matlock serve villages between Matlock, Bakewell and Baslow to Chesterfield, and Bakewell to Eyam and Tideswell. South Yorkshire Transport run to Bakewell from Sheffield. The "Lincman" express service is jointly operated by "East Midland", "Mansfield & District", "Silver Service" and "Ribble" between Lincoln and Manchester. Use of bus services: Never Rarely Occasion. Daily Local 44% 8% 32% 16% Express 82% 3% 12% 3% {CARS} Very few families do not have a car. Most families have more than one. The most popular makes are: Ford VW Vauxhall Austin Renault 26% 10% 8% 8% 7% --- European --- British French
